candidate_rules.name: Prioritize High-Demand Locations
candidate_rules.condition: If a location shows high search volume for service terms, then allocate resources to create a page

candidate_rules.name: Single H1 per Page
candidate_rules.condition: If a page has multiple H1 tags, prioritize the primary location keyword

candidate_rules.name: Location-Specific Service Prioritization
candidate_rules.condition: If a service is offered in a specific location, prioritize it in the service section

candidate_rules.name: Unique Content Requirement
candidate_rules.condition: If a location page contains duplicated or generic content, penalize

top_tactics_summary: [low/1x] Keyword Research for Location Prioritization: Identify high-demand locations using keyword data to prioritize pages that align with user intent and market size.
[low/1x] Keyword Variation Strategy: Use multiple keyword variations on a single location page to capture diverse search intent while maintaining low competi
[low/1x] Title Structure with Service + Location: Use a clear, keyword-rich title format to signal location intent and improve rankings
[low/1x] Local Context in Introduction: Highlight location-specific services and unique offerings early to signal local relevance and expertise.
[low/1x] Service Section with Local Keywords: List core services with location-specific keyword variations to reinforce local intent.
top_patterns_summary: [low/1x] : Target specific services in defined geographic areas to align with user search intent
[low/1x] : Target specific service-location combinations to capture hyper-local intent
[low/1x] : Target specific services in geographic locations to capture local intent
[low/1x] : Combine service type with specific location to target hyper-local intent
